Spatio-temporal analyses of landscape dynamics across the biosphere, geosphere, and cryosphere are crucial in tackling today’s global environmental challenges. From land use and cover changes to glacier retreat and vegetation shifts, Geographic Information Systems (GIS) and Remote Sensing (RS) offer essential tools for research and real-world problem-solving.

- 🖥️ **Hybrid Format**: [Register to get your invitation!](https://forms.office.com/e/rf88TNBL4x?origin=lprLink)
